name: Island Adventure - Bird Blast
description:
Go on an island adventure with TapBlaze's new match three game, Island Adventure! Join Lulu and her fox buddy as they navigate to beautiful islands and rescue the birds from the hunter!

HIGHLIGHTS

• Simple, fun, and casual match 3 gameplay!
• Rescue the birds to earn valuable rewards!
• Over 100 fun yet challenging levels with more to come!
• Call on your island friends for amazing boosters to beat even the most challenging puzzles!
• Explore new islands with unique puzzles and game mechanics!
• Check back often for events, free rewards and new levels!

NOTES

• Please note that Island Adventure is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. In addition, Blast allows you to link to social media services such as Facebook, which is optional.

• Under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Bird Blast.

Privacy Policy:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/terms-conditions/

Have fun playing Island Adventure!
